biotools.summary: The CORDERLY software analyses colloidal ordering via the 2D fast Fourier transform, the radial distribution function, the spatial distribution function, and the angular distribution. The spatial distribution function plots the resulting analysis in Cartesian and polar coordinates (angular distribution).

bioschemas.name: CORDERLY
